SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! creates a file !:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" ! @echo off : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#..\temp" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE cd /d "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#..\temp" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" cd $HOME :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#../temp" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF :SET &UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME# = "SQL_Script_&$PROCESSOR_RUNID#.sql" :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" = "&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#" echo &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# >> "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" :ELSE echo "&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#" >> "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" :ENDIF :PUB &UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#,,TOP :PUB &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#,,TOP
